definition: archaic variant of 蘇|苏[su1]/to revive
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
a Jesuit/member of Society of Jesus

sentences.english: Premillennialists believe Jesus will come back to make His kingdom in this life.
sentences.chinese: 前千禧年主義者認爲耶穌會回來建立一個屬世的國度。

sentences.english: From the first, the Jesuits concentrated on foreign missions, education, and scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 從第一，耶穌會集中於外國使團，教育和獎學金。

sentences.english: The Jesuits also agreed to send written apologies to their victims.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌會也同意對那些受害者發表書面道歉。

sentences.english: What is the sacrifice of Jesus supposed to do for our minds?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，耶穌會爲此犧牲什麼呢？

sentences.english: The masterpiece of Jesuit architecture is at Namur. It is called Saint-Loup.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌會著名的建築是在那慕爾，名叫聖路教堂。

sentences.english: Following the Jesuits' coming to China between the Ming and Qing Dynasties, the influence of the Catholicism widely spreaded over the country.
sentences.chinese: 明清之際耶穌會士入華，天主教在中國影響廣泛。

sentences.english: like maybe the Peace Corps or Jesuit Volunteer Corps.
sentences.chinese: 像和平隊或耶穌會志願者之類的。

sentences.english: I was a freshman at an all-boys Jesuit high school.
sentences.chinese: 我是耶穌會男子高中的新生。

sentences.english: Sir, ask yourself, what will Jesus do?
sentences.chinese: 老師，請捫心自問，耶穌會怎麼做？

sentences.english: In 1922, the Jesuits founded the Industrial and Commercial School.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌會會士也於1922年創辦了工商學校。

sentences.english: Would Jesus have backed the Iraq war?
sentences.chinese: 耶穌會支持伊拉克戰爭嗎？

definition: a Jesuit/member of Society of Jesus
Matteo Ricci (1552-1610), Jesuit missionary and translator in Ming China

pinyin: Di4 yi1 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4
